mapper.select: SELECT p.product_name, o.order_id, o.count, o.status, o.client_name, o.client_tel FROM product AS p, `order` AS o WHERE p.product_id = o.product_id AND o.status = 'unsolved' LIMIT 1;
SELECT product_name, SUM(count) AS "count" FROM `order`, product WHERE `order`.status = "unsolved" AND `order`.product_id = product.product_id GROUP BY order.product_id;
